definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: The Eimeria species, causative agents of the disease coccidiosis, are genetically complex protozoan parasites endemic in poultry.
sentences.chinese: 雞球蟲病是嚴重危害養禽業的一種寄生蟲病。

sentences.english: Effect is quick and highly. It has reliable destroying and inhibiting effect to all kinds of coccidial.
sentences.chinese: 作用迅速高效，對各種球蟲都有很好的殺滅作用。

sentences.english: Bovine coccidiosis is one of important protozoa diseases.
sentences.chinese: 牛球蟲病是牛的重要寄生性原蟲病之一。

sentences.english: Eimeria tenella hybridization F2 strain oocysts were attenuated by chemical preparation.
sentences.chinese: 採用化學致弱劑致弱柔嫩艾美耳球蟲雜交F2株卵囊。

sentences.english: Avian Coccidiosis is one of the high incidence Verminosis, which do harm to poultry industry .
sentences.chinese: 球蟲病是危害養雞業的一種普遍多發的寄生蟲病。

sentences.english: There are all kinds of reports about Coccidiosis in every country all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 世界上各個國家都先後報道了雞球蟲病的爆發情況。

sentences.english: The aim was to identify Eimeria tenella Xining strain.
sentences.chinese: 鑑定雞柔嫩艾美耳球蟲西寧株。

sentences.english: Current control of coccidiosis relies heavily on chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 現在的雞球蟲病控制主要依賴於藥物。

sentences.english: Reports about applications of dyeing in coccidia have been deficient.
sentences.chinese: 國內外對染色方法在球蟲方面的應用報道較少。

sentences.english: The efficacy of frequently-used 8 coccidiostats in Qinhuangdao area was evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 對秦皇島市場上常用的8種抗球蟲藥的藥效作了評價。

sentences.english: For a long time, anticoccidial drugs of many different chemical types have been the dominant means to prevent and control chicken coccidiosis.
sentences.chinese: 迄今爲止，藥物防治仍是防治雞球蟲病的主要措施。

sentences.english: Objective To seek the safe and effective method of expelling coccidian of altitude pika.
sentences.chinese: 目的探求一種安全高效的驅治高原鼠兔球蟲的方法。

sentences.english: Coccidiosis causes economic lossess of billions of dollars annually in China.
sentences.chinese: 據統計雞球蟲每年給我國養雞業造成數十億元損失。

sentences.english: Objective To get the message of the coccidian infection of rabbits in Zhangjiakou area.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解張家口地區兔球蟲種類及感染情況。

sentences.english: The results showed that E. stigmosa was mild pathogenic for goslings.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，多斑艾美球蟲對家鵝致病性較小。

sentences.english: Rabbit coccidian is a kind of parasitic protozoan of Eimeria.
sentences.chinese: 兔球蟲屬於艾美耳科的寄生性原蟲。
